item.title: Gina add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "It doesn't matter what people tell you. It doesn't matter what they might say. Sometimes you have to leave home. Sometimes, running away means you're headed in the exact right direction." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Gina add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "Sometimes the right thing feels all wrong until it is over and done with." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Gina add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Gina add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "She is too fond of books, and it has turned her brain." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Gina add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them, and try to follow where they lead." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Gina add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "Life is short, but it is wide. Genevieve Whitman taught me that." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Gina add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "Sidda can't help herself. She just loves books. Loves the way they feel, the way they smell, loves the black letters marching across the white pages..." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Gina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "We dance for laughter, we dance for tears, we dance for madness, we dance for fears, we dance for hopes, we dance for screams, we are the dancers, we create the dreams." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Gina add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Sex is kicking death in the ass while singing." -- Charles Bukowski
